description: Details required by Condition 4 (Typical Details for Planning), Condition 9 (Construction Management Plan) and Condition 10 (Drainage) of Planning Permission 17/16196/FUL (Proposed demolition of existing Southborough Nursing Home and replacement with a new Nursing Home over basement, ground, first and part 2nd floors.
